name: CHAOTIC SPACE JOURNEY
description:
Chaotic Space Journey is a bullet-hell game about deflecting bullets, defeating waves and unlocking abilities.

There is 3 normal enemies, 4 bosses and 3 cool items. And oh yeah, there is also explosions ;)

[Controls]

  • Movement - WASD
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Shield - Left mouse button
  • Dash - Right mouse button

[Made by]

  • Programming and art by Karsten F. Pedersen
  • Music by Kaizen 'Master Doot' Shirosaki

[Dev highscore] 61580

This game was made for The Indie Games Lab Jam #3 and the theme was "bullet hell".

And thanks for reading :)
